title: High Test Fishing Line
summaries: The High Test Fishing Line is an accessory that prevents fishing line from breaking while fishing, when equipped. It is acquired as a 2.5*1/40 (2.5%) chance reward for completing a Fishing quest for the Angler NPC, depending on the number of completed quests and other factors (for details, see Angler).
Without the High Test Fishing Line equipped, there is a 14.29*1/7 (14.29%) chance that the line will break on any reel-in that was supposed to yield a catch.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Angler will not give the player a High Test Fishing Line as a reward if they already have one in their inventory or in any of their portable storage items. However, if the player has a High Test Fishing Line, Angler Earring, and Tackle Box (or they have one of the accessories crafted from them, the Angler Tackle Bag or Lavaproof Tackle Bag) in their inventories, he will be able to give the player duplicate High Test Fishing Lines.

statistics.Sell: 1
